reviews.review: ahead of its time, best coop game to date.

When I picked up Portal 1 in 2015, I wanted to play it and win.

Of course, being the young boy I was, I never did and rage quit after a few chambers.

Here came 2017, and I wanted to try again, feeling a whole lot smarter, and I actually beat the game fairly quickly; therefore, I got Portal 2, and boom shakalaka, I wish, to this day, Portal 3 was a joint everyone could smoke (not that I endorse smoking, although technically I just did) and enjoy.

Incredibly fun time that really challenged me, would reccomend avoiding walkthroughs no matter how stuck you are, so much more rewarding that way. Much more fun than the orginial as some of the later puzzles were really quite hard.

Killing your friends using Portal mechanics is really funny

A very nice game and experience, the singleplayer story was so good, i think i'll play it again just for the fun o it. Having a coop mode for a game like this is amazing if you have a buddy, the graphics were good but you can also run it on a potato. Overall a great game even if its almost 9 years old. Good Job Valve
there's this woman called glados and i kid you not she turned herself into a potatao and call herself potaOS funniest shit i've ever seen
This game is a must play, its accessible to anyone, its fun and the story is really intriguing.

Single player is great -- but the real gold is gotten from teaming up with different people. It really does expose some interesting team-dynamics :)

Cannot recommend any game higher than this.

The only thing negative about this game is that it sometimes makes me nauseous while playing it. All the moving around is not good for me I guess lololol Anyways, if you have a stronger stomach, you'll have fun trying to figure out how to pass each level. It can be a bit challenging but I think that's the fun part. It's not TOO challenging, so you'll be able to pass each level.

Il piÃ¹ bel gioco della storia dei videogame! Assolutamente geniale!
10/10 would recommend to new gamers. this game also works with low end pc's like mine and runs at about 50fps

Portal 1 was a fantastic game, but portal 2 takes the golden cup that is portal 1, and turns it into a Solar Cup, and creates of the most entertaining valve games i've ever played. 
If you haven't gotten this game, let alone portal 1, you might as well be shoved back into the womb, 
because this is a step in your life that will forever mark you as.. A true Gamer.
This game is so great, the logic, the humor, just everything

Its a wonderful game with great atmospheres and puzzles that really make you think outside the box. The whole portal concept is wonderful on so many levels, when you think about wormholes and teleportation etc. You dont need to be concerned about the specifics, only the geometry of it all. I love the way it makes me feel theres a freedom in game play like no other i have played. Have fun, its my second time round both games after a long break, highly recommended.
